charge_type.source: Fu now pleads guilty to conspiracy to traffic in a dangerous drug, namely, cocaine with So and Lam and other persons unknown between 1 and 2 October 2021 in Hong Kong.

drugs.source: For Fu, there is 20.44 grammes of cocaine he admits he delivered to So in relation to the 1st count he faces.

roles.source: Apart from messages with So, the police found a WhatsApp group in Fu’s mobile showing members of the WhatsApp group sending out instructions of customers, their drug order, the price to pay and location of delivery... He handed her a bag... He revealed a drug storage premises in Mongkok to the police... They found a tenancy agreement dated 23 September 2021 signed by Fu and the 2nd defendant, Lam.

guilty_plea.source: Before his trial, this defendant reconsidered in light of the additional evidence against him and indicated a plea. He has pleaded guilty before me today and admitted the Summary of Facts.

starting_point.source: According to the latest sentencing guidelines, those trafficking in 26.63 grammes of cocaine would attract a mathematical starting point of 6 years and 3 months' imprisonment.

sentence_after_role.source: Inferred as starting point since role adjustment not provided

notional_sentence.source: According to the latest sentencing guidelines, those trafficking in 26.63 grammes of cocaine would attract a mathematical starting point of 6 years and 3 months' imprisonment.

final_sentence.source: I intend to take a starting point of 6 years and 3 months' imprisonment and I will reduce it by 23 months. Fu is sentenced to 4 years and 4 months' imprisonment for Count 1.

charge_type.source: So has pleaded guilty to conspiracy to traffic in a dangerous drug, namely, cocaine with Fu, the defendant of 316/2023, and other persons unknown, between two dates, 1 and 2 October 2021 in Hong Kong.

drugs.source: On 2 October 2021, at around 1.30 am... She had in her bag 87 plastic bags containing a total of 23.05 grammes of a solid containing a total of 20.44 grammes of cocaine.

roles.source: She was added to a WhatsApp group and received instructions... She would receive phone calls or messages from drug suppliers to tell her where to pick up the drugs... She then proceeded to make deliveries as instructed all over Kowloon and New Territories.

mitigating_factors.source: I have been urged to consider increasing her one-third discount for her offer to give evidence against her co-accused and her statement to the police implicating him... She is entitled to a further discount for her cooperation and assistance.

guilty_plea.source: The 1st and 2nd defendant of 317/2023 pleaded guilty to their respective charges at the earliest opportunity and were committed to the Court of First Instance for sentence to be dealt with after the trial of their co-accused...

starting_point.source: For the 1st defendant, So, I will take into account the drugs found on her in her bag and that was 20.44 grammes of cocaine. Now according to the latest sentencing guidelines, those trafficking in 20.44 grammes of cocaine would attract a mathematical starting point of 5 years and 9 months’ imprisonment.

sentence_after_role.source: Inferred as starting point since role adjustment not provided

notional_sentence.source: For the 1st defendant, So, I will take into account the drugs found on her in her bag and that was 20.44 grammes of cocaine. Now according to the latest sentencing guidelines, those trafficking in 20.44 grammes of cocaine would attract a mathematical starting point of 5 years and 9 months’ imprisonment.

mitigation_reduction.source: I have been urged to consider increasing her one-third discount for her offer to give evidence against her co-accused and her statement to the police implicating him... She is entitled to a further discount for her cooperation and assistance.

final_sentence.source: Therefore, for 317/2023, Count 1 against the 1st defendant, So, I intend to take a starting point of 5 years and 9 months and I will reduce it to 3 years’ imprisonment.

charge_type.source: Lam has pleaded guilty to conspiracy to traffic in a dangerous drug, namely, cocaine and cannabis in a herbal form with Fu, the defendant of 316/2023, and other persons unknown between 22 September and 3 October 2021, both dates inclusive, in Hong Kong.

drugs.source: For the 2nd defendant, Lam, I will take into account the cocaine found on him and the cocaine found in the premises rented by Fu and Lam which totals 109.19 grammes of cocaine.
There is 6 grammes of herbal cannabis, which I consider de minimis in the circumstances and therefore ignore it.

roles.source: He was on his way to the flat... he was instructed... to collect this cocaine... then he was to take it back to the subdivided unit in Mongkok and repackage the drugs into smaller bags.

They used keys found on Fu to gain access to the premises... When questioned, he said he intended to go into those premises. He was searched and police found keys to the premises as well as five packets in his backpack containing a total of 118 grammes...

guilty_plea.source: The 1st and 2nd defendant of 317/2023 pleaded guilty to their respective charges at the earliest opportunity and were committed to the Court of First Instance for sentence to be dealt with after the trial of their co-accused...

starting_point.source: For the 2nd defendant, Lam, I will take into account the cocaine found on him and the cocaine found in the premises rented by Fu and Lam which totals 109.19 grammes of cocaine. According to the latest sentencing guidelines, those trafficking in 109.19 grammes of cocaine would attract a mathematical starting point of 9 years and 7 months' imprisonment.

sentence_after_role.source: Inferred as starting point since role adjustment not provided

notional_sentence.source: I intend to take a starting point of 9 years and 6 months' imprisonment

mitigation_reduction.source: Lam is entitled to the full one-third discount for their pleas of guilty at the earliest opportunity.

final_sentence.source: I intend to take a starting point of 9 years and 6 months' imprisonment and reduce it by 38 months to reflect his plea at the earliest opportunity. Lam is sentenced to 6 years and 4 months’ imprisonment.
